title.rendered: The Importance of Public Interest Technology

content.rendered:
Recently, CTD Co-founder and Board Member Daisy Magnus-Aryitey spoke with New America about her origins in technology, her work here at Code the Dream, and why public interest technology is important work for the health and growth of our communities.

Read the full story here: https://www.newamerica.org/pit-un/blog/qa-with-daisy-magnus-aryitey-co-founder-of-code-the-dream/

excerpt.rendered: Recently, CTD Co-founder and Board Member Daisy Magnus-Aryitey spoke with New America about her origins in technology, her work here at Code the Dream, and why public interest technology is important work for the health and growth of our communities.
